introduction: This marketing relationship plan is designed for electronics and consumer technology retailers looking to build long-term customer relationships through product expertise, support, and upgrade cycles.

company_summary.name: Electronics Brand
company_summary.activities: Consumer electronics retail, including smartphones, computers, audio equipment, and smart home devices
company_summary.target: Tech-savvy consumers aged 18-55 interested in the latest technology, gadgets, and smart solutions

programs_list.objective: Understand customer tech preferences and convert to first purchase within 30 days
programs_list.kpi: Tech profile completion, First purchase conversion, Category engagement
programs_list.description: A personalized welcome journey that identifies customer tech interests and recommends relevant products.

scenarios.main_messages_ideas: Welcome + interests survey, Category spotlight, Buying guides, First purchase offer

how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for detailed product content + SMS for flash deals and stock alerts
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Pre-built electronics industry templates with product category logic help you launch quickly.

how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Set up once and let automation handle timing - triggers fire automatically based on purchase anniversary.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Post-purchase automation ensures every customer receives the right onboarding content based on their specific product purchase.

how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Content templates by product category make it easy to maintain quality across your entire catalog.

conclusion: Electronics retailers that implement these relationship marketing programs can expect higher customer lifetime value through well-timed upgrade cycles, reduced returns through better onboarding, and stronger attachment rates for high-margin services like extended warranties.
